Detailed Description

cvmx_bgx::_smu::_tx_ifg

Programming IFG1 and IFG2: * For XAUI/RXAUI/10Gbs/40Gbs systems that require IEEE 802.3 compatibility, the IFG1+IFG2 sum must be 12. * In loopback mode, the IFG1+IFG2 of local and remote parties must match exactly; otherwise one of the two sides' loopback FIFO will overrun: BGX()_SMU()_TX_INT[LB_OVRFLW].
